name: Futanari Sex - The New Boss
description:
About the game
An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of an overbearing new futanari boss doing her best to intimidate the all-female personnel in her first day at work.
Visual Novel description
Watch out, ladies…there’s a new boss in the building!
BRYCE FINN – the notorious Brand manager of EROS ONLY INC has come to the Eastern Branch Office to stir things up.
So, clean your desks, sharpen your pencils, and drop your panties…
It’s going to be one hell of a ride!
The Eastern Branch office was left in ruin by an eccentric old boss.
The numbers don’t lie.
Mr. Welch was well known in the industry for hiring a female-only staff. And if that wasn’t bad enough, he recruited them based on their looks, and not brains…
He couldn’t be bothered with things like college degrees. As long as they had a decent bra cup and a charming smile, they were rewarded with the highest paid salary in the advertising industry and a bullet proof employment contract which pissed off even the meanest of lawyers.
That contract also made it impossible for the company to fire them.
At least not without pissing off Welch and taking a serious blow to their already thin wallet...
But Mr. Welch was very old, and he passed away recently.
His shares were equally divided between the remaining shareholders, so it was time for a change. And the first major change will be getting rid of Welch’s crew of entitled ladies.
Bryce Finn was sent to make that happen by any means.
Will the new boss manage to kick them out?
Or will the girls prove themselves to be far cleverer than she thought?
Follow her story and find out…
